product_snapshot.description: Smart ring tracking sleep, activity, heart rate, temperature, respiratory rate, blood oxygen via IR LEDs and app.
product_snapshot.target_user: Health-conscious adults prioritizing recovery (athletes, biohackers, professionals).

founders.name: Petteri Lahtela, Kari Kivelä, Markku Koskela
founders.relevant_lived_experience: Engineering in sensors/algorithms; Finland's tech ecosystem.
founders.founder_motivation: Speculative: Personal sleep issues in long winters; positioned via sensor access. [1]

core_pain_problem.why_existing_solutions_failed: Wrist devices uncomfortable, inaccurate for sleep.
core_pain_problem.emotional_or_practical_cost: Loss of control over performance; burnout risk. [1]

world_state.social_cultural: Quantified self / biohacking normalized sleep data as status. [1]
world_state.economic: Post-2008 VC for health tech; 2015 seed/Kickstarter viable. [1]
world_state.user_behavior: Shift to always-on insights, rejecting obtrusive wear. [1]
world_state.anthropological_psychological: Anxiety drove data rituals for predictability. [1]
world_state.technological: Miniaturized IR LEDs, BLE enabled finger tracking. [1]

fundamental_human_need.why_it_mattered_then: Burnout in hustle culture amplified agency need. [1]

success_synthesis.why_it_worked: Outlasted via recovery focus + sensor timing.
